channel.title: Training zone?
channel.description:
Well i downloaded iclarity server it didn't have shops but i added my own. But my problem is it has no training area so how are my players supposed to train. If anyone can help me with train area ill be glad.
also how to make the npc respawn, thanks
ty

item.title: Training zone?
item.dc:creator: @krazy_karl krazy karl
item.description:
@krazy_karl wrote:

Try coding a ::mypos command, helps with the Co-ords for adding NPC’s.

Read full topic

item.title: Training zone?
item.dc:creator: @raped_by_who raped by who
item.description:
@raped_by_who wrote:

Uhm? re-direct teleports to an area you want the training area to be.

Then make the NPC’s spawn there on servers initilization.

also how to make the npc respawn, thanks

As far as that goes…

3) We are not a spoonfeeding community

Read full topic
